answers.answer: Hi.  Did anyone tell you that you have a prolonged QT interval?  If you don't, you're not at risk for the R on T phenomenon.

question: i have had MVP with unifocal PVc's since my early 20's when i weighed 110 lbs and 5'5".  I am now 45 300 lbs due to 60 mg Paxil, type II diabetes and I ahve been havveng tons of pvc's.  my cardiologist did every test imaginable and the are all within normal limits.  am i at risk for an r on t he says they are benign.  I am a non smoker and would like to try slim fast twice a day and reasonable meal for dinner.  I see the endo crinologist next week.
title: PVC'S with MVP
